title: America’s Day to Choose | Guests: Kirstie Alley & Rep. Chip Roy | 11/3/20
description:
It’s Election Day 2020, and this generation has a chance to vote FOR something: Whether the American experiment should continue. Glenn hears from listeners who voted today. BlazeTV’s Elijah Schaffer joins live from outside the White House’s multiple layers of fences. Jason Buttrill breaks down the protests already planned for tonight. Rep. Chip Roy discusses his race against far-left candidate Wendy Davis, and congressional candidate Burgess Owens gives an update on his close race after a campaign ad was taken down. BlazeTV’s Steve Deace gives his final thoughts on the polls and what the Left’s game might actually be. Actress Kirstie Alley talks voting for Trump twice and feuding with CNN over its depressing coronavirus coverage.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
